summary: A band of Mexican gun-runners employed by a revolutionary general accept an American into their gang, unaware of his intentions.
cast: Gian Maria Volontè|Klaus Kinski|Martine Beswick|Lou Castel|Jaime Fernández|Andrea Checchi|Spartaco Conversi|Joaquín Parra|Aldo Sambrell|José Manuel Martín|Santiago Santos|Valentino Macchi|Sal Borgese|Damiano Damiani|Carla Gravina|Guy Heron|Rufino Inglés|Vicente Roca|Antoñito Ruiz|Aysanoa Runachagua
title: Yo soy la revolución
